translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無抵抗で占領されるってわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So they're being occupied without resistance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵は硬い表情のまま、重く頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldier nodded heavily, his expression grim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砦だけでなく、街もいくつか落とされました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not only the forts, but several towns have fallen as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠りから覚めない市民は皆、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the citizens who haven't awakened from their sleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 病院に搬送しております」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been transported to hospitals."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砦も街も無抵抗のまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Both forts and towns remain undefended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されることが相次ぎ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and are being successively occupied by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦線はガタガタに崩されております……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the frontlines have been shattered into chaos..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までは敵がどれだけ強くとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, no matter how strong the enemy was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ちこたえることは出来たのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we were able to hold out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回はそれすら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but this time, even that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、役立たず共が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, useless fools."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか、お願いいたします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, I beg of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統、我らをお救い下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: President Rance, save us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ……」
「とりあえず前線の砦に行ってみるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, let's go check the frontline fort."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が街道を進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others proceeded down the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、シィルが申し訳なさそうな声を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Along the way, Seere spoke with an apologetic voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラさん？　どうかしましたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satella? Is something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど、どうかしたかって何がだ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wh-What do you mean, 'what's wrong'!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんでそんなこと聞くんだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Why are you asking something like that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嘘へたくそか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're a terrible liar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なにを隠してる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you hiding?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの、言いにくいことなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, if it's something hard to say,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいんですけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's okay..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ぐ……うううう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... uuuu..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、別に隠すような話でもないしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, well, it's not really something to hide anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは、城の参謀連中には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've already told the castle's strategists,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に言ったことだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回の犯人は魔人ワーグだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The culprit this time is the demon Warg."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっぱり魔人のせいなのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it really was a demon's doing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな奴だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of guy is he?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……厄介な奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...A troublesome one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「派閥戦争の折にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the faction wars,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴の能力にはサテラ達も歯が立たなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even Satella and the others couldn't contend with his abilities."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前がそれほど言うとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To hear you say that much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなに強い奴なのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is he really that strong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「身体能力は普通の人間と変わらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His physical abilities are no different from an ordinary human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の中でも最弱だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s the weakest among the demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その代わり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、ひたすらに厄介なんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he is simply an utter nuisance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴は周りの生物を眠らせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He emits a powerful pheromone that puts surrounding creatures to sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強力なフェロモンを常に放っている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He constantly releases this strong pheromone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「街一つなら軽く包み込めるほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His pheromones cover a wide range, enough to easily envelop an entire town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広範囲に及ぶフェロモンだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a widespread pheromone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それを吸い込んだ者は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who inhales it quickly falls asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっという間に眠りに落ちる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They drop into slumber in an instant."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数百、数千……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hundreds, thousands...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、数万という単位の部隊が瞬く間に眠らされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, tens of thousands of units are instantly put to sleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘力がなくなったところを撃破されるんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and defeated once their combat abilities vanish..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ達にとって……悪夢のような魔人だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Satella and the others... he is like a nightmare demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知ってたなら、もっと早く言わんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you knew, why didn’t you say so sooner?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……サテラ自身、認めたくなかったんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Satella herself didn’t want to admit it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またあいつが敵になるなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That he would become an enemy again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに確証がなかったのもある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, there was no definite proof.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無抵抗で占領されるってわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So they're being occupied without resistance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵は硬い表情のまま、重く頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldier nodded heavily, his expression grim.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砦だけでなく、街もいくつか落とされました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not only the forts, but several towns have fallen as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠りから覚めない市民は皆、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the citizens who haven't awakened from their sleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 病院に搬送しております」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have been transported to hospitals."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「砦も街も無抵抗のまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Both forts and towns remain undefended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されることが相次ぎ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and are being successively occupied by the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦線はガタガタに崩されております……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the frontlines have been shattered into chaos..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までは敵がどれだけ強くとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until now, no matter how strong the enemy was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ちこたえることは出来たのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we were able to hold out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回はそれすら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but this time, even that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、役立たず共が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, useless fools."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうか、お願いいたします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, I beg of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統、我らをお救い下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: President Rance, save us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ……」
「とりあえず前線の砦に行ってみるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, let's go check the frontline fort."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が街道を進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others proceeded down the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、シィルが申し訳なさそうな声を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Along the way, Seere spoke with an apologetic voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラさん？　どうかしましたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satella? Is something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど、どうかしたかって何がだ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wh-What do you mean, 'what's wrong'!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: な、なんでそんなこと聞くんだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Why are you asking something like that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嘘へたくそか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're a terrible liar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なにを隠してる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you hiding?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの、言いにくいことなら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, if it's something hard to say,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいんですけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's okay..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ぐ……うううう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... uuuu..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、別に隠すような話でもないしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, well, it's not really something to hide anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは、城の参謀連中には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've already told the castle's strategists,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に言ったことだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回の犯人は魔人ワーグだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The culprit this time is the demon Warg."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっぱり魔人のせいなのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So it really was a demon's doing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな奴だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What kind of guy is he?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……厄介な奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...A troublesome one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「派閥戦争の折にも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the faction wars,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴の能力にはサテラ達も歯が立たなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even Satella and the others couldn't contend with his abilities."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前がそれほど言うとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To hear you say that much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなに強い奴なのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is he really that strong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「身体能力は普通の人間と変わらん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His physical abilities are no different from an ordinary human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の中でも最弱だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s the weakest among the demons."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その代わり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、ひたすらに厄介なんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he is simply an utter nuisance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴は周りの生物を眠らせる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He emits a powerful pheromone that puts surrounding creatures to sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強力なフェロモンを常に放っている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He constantly releases this strong pheromone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「街一つなら軽く包み込めるほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "His pheromones cover a wide range, enough to easily envelop an entire town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広範囲に及ぶフェロモンだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a widespread pheromone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それを吸い込んだ者は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who inhales it quickly falls asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっという間に眠りに落ちる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They drop into slumber in an instant."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数百、数千……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hundreds, thousands...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、数万という単位の部隊が瞬く間に眠らされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, tens of thousands of units are instantly put to sleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘力がなくなったところを撃破されるんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and defeated once their combat abilities vanish..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ達にとって……悪夢のような魔人だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Satella and the others... he is like a nightmare demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知ってたなら、もっと早く言わんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you knew, why didn’t you say so sooner?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……サテラ自身、認めたくなかったんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Satella herself didn’t want to admit it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またあいつが敵になるなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That he would become an enemy again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに確証がなかったのもある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, there was no definite proof.
